title: Land for Sale within Kandy City Limit
details:
Here is an opportunity to buy a land with a breathtaking view of the Mahaweli river and in close proximity to the cinnamon citadel hotel.

-3 minute distance from Kandy City Centre
-located in Samadi Mawatha
-direct access from carpet road
-suitable for residential or commercial purposes
-calm and peaceful area

This land is being sold with the value for the land only. THE HOUSE (1 BEDROOM WITH AN ATTACHED BATHROOM) COMES WITH NO ADDITIONAL PAYMENTS.

For more information, please call the number listed.
0725300174 or 00971561861248
